description:
AT&T Mobile Locate gives you the convenience and security of an all-in-one mobile protection solution for your iPhone® device AND personal data.
Easily back up contacts, photos and videos no matter where you are. Secure your personal data for free over AT&T’s network or Wi-Fi, whether at home OR on vacation. 
With AT&T Mobile Locate, your most important data is always protected and accessible through our secure online portal, even if your iPhone isn’t. 

Quickly find your lost phone by locating it on a map from the web, and sound an alarm if it’s nearby. 
And, when you need live support, an iPhone expert is only seconds away with our new click to call feature (available for AT&T Mobile Protection Pack customers).

How does it work?
Log on to att.com/mpp from any browser, anywhere to access to the following capabilities: 

• CLOUD BACKUP: Sync contacts, photos and videos using Wi-Fi or AT&T network and easily access them from the web
• FREE DATA: Your data plan will not be charged if you backup using AT&T’s network
• DATA RESTORE: Restore contacts, photos and videos to a new device - even if it’s not an iPhone 
• CLICK TO CALL:  Directly dial a friendly iPhone expert from your phone for Enhanced Support.
• LOSS AND THEFT PROTECTION: Track your iPhone on a map or with an alarm. 

Who’s eligible?
Mobile Locate is exclusively available to AT&T iPhone customers. 

Important notes
Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life. Device must be powered on, have text messaging capability, and be within the AT&T National Enhanced Services Coverage Area for AT&T Mobile Locate features to function. Data usage applies for download and use. AT&T Mobile Locate is a service provided by Asurion Mobile Applications, LLC and is not an insurance product.  iPhone® is a registered trademark of Apple Inc. Asurion Mobile Applications, LLC is not endorsed by, affiliated with or sponsored by Apple Inc.
Copyright © 2014 Asurion, LLC
releaseNotes: Compatible with iOS 8 . Also includes minor bug fixes.
